/* 업체별 상상시간 설정 */ INSERT INTO ev_consult_time ( consult_time_id, ev_expo_id, cust_id, consult_from_dt, consult_to_dt, tiemzone_cd, consult_from_time, consult_to_time, ins_user, ins_dtm, mod_user, mod_dtm ) VALUES ( NULL, #{ev_expo_id}, #{cust_id}, #{consult_from_dt}, #{consult_to_dt}, #{tiemzone_cd}, #{consult_from_time}, #{consult_to_time}, #{user_id}, NOW(), #{user_id}, NOW() )

/* 상담스케줄생성 */ INSERT INTO ev_consult_schedule ( schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , consult_rsv_cust_id , consult_avail_yn , del_yn , ins_user , ins_dtm , mod_user , mod_dtm ) WITH RECURSIVE dt AS ( SELECT STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_from_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}),'%Y-%m-%d') AS LEVEL UNION ALL SELECT 1 + dt.LEVEL FROM dt WHERE dt.LEVEL < STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_to_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}),'%Y-%m-%d') ) SELECT null /* schedule_id */ , #{ev_expo_id} , #{consult_time_id} /* consult_time_id */ , dt.LEVEL AS consult_dt , a.cd_id AS consult_time_cd , '' AS consult_rsv_cust_id , (case when (SELECT 1 FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and a.cd_id between consult_from_time and consult_to_time) = 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end) AS consult_avail_yn , 'N' AS del_yn , #{user_id} AS ins_user , NOW() AS ins_dtm , #{user_id} AS mod_user , NOW() AS mod_dtm FROM ev_comm_code a , dt WHERE upper_cd_id = '214000' AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as consult_time_id
/* 상담스케줄 변경 시 생성 */ INSERT INTO ev_consult_schedule ( schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , consult_rsv_cust_id , consult_avail_yn , consult_rsv_stat_cd , remarks , del_yn , ins_user , ins_dtm , mod_user , mod_dtm ) select null schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , #{consult_rsv_cust_id} as consult_rsv_cust_id , #{consult_avail_yn} as consult_avail_yn , #{consult_rsv_stat_cd} as consult_rsv_stat_cd , #{remarks} as remarks , 'N' del_yn , #{user_id} , NOW() , #{user_id} , NOW() from ev_consult_schedule where schedule_id = #{schedule_id}

select ecs.schedule_id , ect.ev_expo_id , ect.consult_time_id , ect.cust_id , ecs.consult_dt , ecs.consult_time_cd , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd) as consult_time_nm , ecs.consult_avail_yn , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id end as consult_rsv_cust_id , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecm.cust_nm end as consult_rsv_cust_nm , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd end as consult_rsv_stat_cd , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) end as tel_no from ev_consult_schedule ecs left outer join ev_cust_mst ecm on ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = ecm.cust_id , ev_consult_time ect where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id
and schedule_id = #{schedule_id}
and ect.consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and ect.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} and (ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'Y' or ecs.consult_time_cd between ect.consult_from_time and ect.consult_to_time)
and nvl(ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id,'') in ('',#{consult_rsv_cust_id})
and nvl(ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd,'') in ('','215001','215002') and ecs.del_yn = 'N' order by consult_time_nm asc

select ecs.schedule_id , ecm.cust_id , ecm.cust_nm , nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) as tel_no from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_cust_mst ecm where ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.schedule_id = #{schedule_id}

select ecm.consult_msg_id , ecm.consult_time_id , ecm.schedule_id , ecm.snd_cust_id , ecm.rcv_cust_id , ecm.message , ecm.rcv_yn , ecm.ins_user , DATE_FORMAT(ecm.ins_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as ins_dtm from ev_consult_msg ecm where ecm.consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and ( (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id})) or (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id})) ) order by ecm.ins_dtm asc

select ( select count(*) from ev_consult_msg ecm where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and (snd_cust_id = #{cust_id} or rcv_cust_id = #{cust_id}) ) as chat_cnt , ( select count(*) from ev_consult_schedule ecs where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and consult_rsv_cust_id is not null and consult_rsv_cust_id != '' and del_yn = 'N' and consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') ) as consult_cnt , ( select (count(*) * 30)/60 from ev_consult_schedule ecs where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and consult_rsv_cust_id is not null and consult_rsv_cust_id != '' and del_yn = 'N' and consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') ) as consult_time

/* 참관고객 상담시간 설정 */ select ecs.ev_expo_id , nvl(ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id,#{cust_id}) as cust_id , max(eep.expo_from_dt) as expo_from_dt , max(eep.expo_to_dt) as expo_to_dt , case when nvl(min(ecs.consult_time_cd),'214019') >= '214019' then '214019' else nvl(min(ecs.consult_time_cd),'214019') end as consult_from_time , case when nvl(max(ecs.consult_time_cd),'214036') <= '214036' then '214036' else nvl(max(ecs.consult_time_cd),'214036') end as consult_to_time from ev_expo eep inner join ev_consult_schedule ecs on ecs.ev_expo_id = eep.ev_expo_id and ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = #{cust_id} and ecs.del_yn = 'N' and ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') where eep.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} group by ecs.ev_expo_id, ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id

select ecs.schedule_id , ect.ev_expo_id , ect.consult_time_id , ecm.cust_id as consult_cust_id , ecm.cust_nm as consult_cust_nm , ecs.consult_dt , ecs.consult_time_cd , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd) as consult_time_nm , ecs.consult_avail_yn , ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_consult_time ect , ev_cust_mst ecm where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = #{cust_id} and ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') and ecs.del_yn = 'N' order by consult_dt asc, consult_time_nm asc

select ecs.schedule_id , ecm.cust_id , ecm.cust_nm , nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) as tel_no , ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_consult_time ect , ev_cust_mst ecm where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.schedule_id = #{schedule_id}

select ecm.consult_msg_id , ecm.consult_time_id , ecm.schedule_id , ecm.snd_cust_id , ecm.rcv_cust_id , ecm.message , ecm.rcv_yn , ecm.ins_user , DATE_FORMAT(ecm.ins_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as ins_dtm from ev_consult_msg ecm , ev_consult_time ect where ecm.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} and ( (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id})) or (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id})) ) order by ecm.ins_dtm asc
